.. _others_celltrackr:

celltrackR
=========================================

`celltrackR <https://github.com/ingewortel/celltrackR>`_ is an R-package that
enables complex analysis of cell tracks.

1. Convert data
+++++++++++++++++

.. code-block:: r
    :linenos:
    # get population data and convert
    x <- 1:10
    print(x)
